steps.heading: Opret din profil og udforsk
steps.description: Opret din egen profil og dyk ned på udforskningssiden, hvor du kan sende forbindelsesanmodninger til andre, der fanger din interesse

steps.heading: Tjek din indbakke
steps.description: Tjek din indbakke for anmodninger fra andre brugere, og beslut, om du vil starte relationen

steps.heading: Opret fora
steps.description: Hvis du mener, at dit partnerskab vil blive styrket med flere brugere, har du altid mulighed for at oprette fora med dine forbindelser og deres forbindelser

featuresList.title: Fora
featuresList.description: Opret større fora med dine forbindelser og start dit eget fællesskab

featuresList.title: Forbindelsesanmodninger
featuresList.description: Se alle forbindelsesanmodninger, du har modtaget, på deres dedikerede side

featuresList.title: Selektiv Forbindelse
featuresList.description: Forbind kun med de personer, du ønsker at række ud til

featuresList.title: Ressourcedeling
featuresList.description: Del ressourcer i direkte beskeder og forumchats, hvilket gør arbejdsgangen lettere

commonQuestions.question: Hvem bruger Anthra?
commonQuestions.answer: Anthra er en tjeneste, der bruges af en bred demografi. Tjenesten er for alle, der ønsker at fordybe sig yderligere i deres felt med selskab af en partner, samarbejdspartner eller studieven.

commonQuestions.question: Hvordan opretter jeg nye forbindelser?
commonQuestions.answer: Send forbindelsesanmodninger og vent på deres svar. Forbindelsesanmodninger fra brugere, der ønsker at nå ud til dig, vil blive vist i din indbakke, hvor du kan vælge at acceptere eller afvise.

commonQuestions.question: Hvorfor?
commonQuestions.answer: Alle har en passion, et nicheemne af interesse. At finde nogen eller en gruppe med den samme interesse skaber ofte en gensidig disciplin og en yderligere udvikling af glæden til emnet.

pricingQuestions.question: Kræver det et abonnement?
pricingQuestions.answer: Nej. Der er ingen indbyggede betalinger i tjenesten.

pricingQuestions.question: Er der premiumfunktioner?
pricingQuestions.answer: Ikke endnu, men vores team arbejder på at implementere brugerfeedback, som vi har modtaget undervejs.

steps.heading: Create your profile and explore
steps.description: Create your own profile and dive into the explore page where you can send connection requests to others who pique your interest

steps.heading: Check your inbox
steps.description: Check your inbox for requests from other users, and decide whether or not you want to commence the relationship

steps.heading: Create forums
steps.description: If you believe your partnership would be strengthened with more users, you always have the opportunity to create forums with your connections and their connections

featuresList.title: Forums
featuresList.description: Create larger forums with your connections, and begin your own community

featuresList.title: Connection Requests
featuresList.description: View all connection requests you have received on its dedicated page

featuresList.title: Selective Connecting
featuresList.description: Only connect with the individuals you wish to reach out to

featuresList.title: Resource Sharing
featuresList.description: Share resources in direct messages and forum chats allowing an easier workflow

commonQuestions.question: Who uses Anthra?
commonQuestions.answer: Anthra is a service used by a wide demographic. The service is for anyone who wants to delve further into their field with the company of a partner, collaborator, or study buddy, whatever fits your needs.

commonQuestions.question: How do I make new connections?
commonQuestions.answer: Send connection requests and await their response. Connection requests from users that wish to reach out to you will be shown in your inbox where you can decide to connect or decline.

commonQuestions.question: Why?
commonQuestions.answer: Everyone has a passion, a niche topic of interest. Finding someone or a group of people with the same intrigue tends to create a reciprocal relationship of discipline and a further development of enjoyment in the subject.

pricingQuestions.question: Does it require a subscription?
pricingQuestions.answer: No. There are no inbuilt payments into the service.

pricingQuestions.question: Are there premium features?
pricingQuestions.answer: Not yet, but our team is working on implementing user feedback which we have received along our journey.
